description: This file provides a helper class 'LocaleBootstrap' for setting a default locale in the 'intl' package, primarily for date/time formatting consistency across app startup. It contains methods for initializing and configuring the locale setting.

classes.name: LocaleBootstrap
classes.description: A utility class for initializing the application's locale settings for the 'intl' package.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Sets the default locale for internationalization to a specified value, defaulting to 'en_US'.
